name: Small Business Mavericks, Inc.
description:
Small Business Mavericks is an online marketing agency that specializes in online strategy, website development, search engine optimization and social media strategy, training and implementation.
Utilizing established web best practices, the Small Business Mavericks team provides strategic online marketing solutions that are tailored to the needs of your business, integrated with your overall sales activities and deliver measurable results in the form of increased traffic and new leads for your business.
